remarks: Degree of multiplication of a polynomial on the left by a scalar. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Apr-2015.)
statement:
deg1mul3le.d $e |- D = ( deg1 ` R ) $.
deg1mul3le.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
deg1mul3le.k $e |- K = ( Base ` R ) $.
deg1mul3le.b $e |- B = ( Base ` P ) $.
deg1mul3le.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` P ) $.
deg1mul3le.a $e |- A = ( algSc ` P ) $.
deg1mul3le $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. K /\ G e. B ) -> ( D ` ( ( A ` F ) .x. G ) ) <_ ( D ` G ) ) $.
